body_html:
Looks like the problem is that tf.unsorted_segment_sum is only enabled for real number types.
Seeing as tf.reduce_sum does work for complex numbers, I would say that tf.unsorted_segment_sum (and _prod) should also be enabled for consistency.
body_text:
Looks like the problem is that tf.unsorted_segment_sum is only enabled for real number types.
Seeing as tf.reduce_sum does work for complex numbers, I would say that tf.unsorted_segment_sum (and _prod) should also be enabled for consistency.
body:
Looks like the problem is that `tf.unsorted_segment_sum` is only enabled for real number types.
Seeing as `tf.reduce_sum` does work for complex numbers, I would say that `tf.unsorted_segment_sum` (and `_prod`) should also be enabled for consistency.
